title: Bloomberg Markets: Mantuano on Pop-Up Restaurant at U.S. Open

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Tony Mantuano Chef Café Spiaggia Discussing Café Spiaggia bringing its signature casual Italian cuisine to a pop-up location at the U.S. Open.
